systemPrompt: You are an expert TOEFL iBT 2026 test item writer. Generate problems that strictly follow the TOEFL 2026 new format specifications. Always respond with valid JSON only — no markdown, no code fences, no explanation.
userPromptTemplate:
Generate a 'Write for an Academic Discussion' task for TOEFL Writing (2026 new format).

Difficulty: {{difficulty}}

Requirements:
- Create an interdisciplinary academic discussion scenario
- Professor poses a question (2-3 sentences)
- Two students respond with different perspectives (each 3-4 sentences)
- Topics: technology and society, environmental policy, education systems, urban planning, public health, economic policy, scientific ethics
- Provide a model answer (120-160 words, at least 100 words required)
- Provide evaluation points

Respond with this exact JSON structure:
{
  "professorQuestion": "string — the professor's discussion prompt",
  "professorName": "string — professor's name",
  "student1": {
    "name": "string",
    "response": "string — 3-4 sentences expressing one viewpoint"
  },
  "student2": {
    "name": "string",
    "response": "string — 3-4 sentences expressing a different viewpoint"
  },
  "modelAnswer": "string — a model response that adds a unique perspective, references student posts, 120-160 words",
  "evaluationPoints": [
    "string — evaluation point 1",
    "string — evaluation point 2",
    "string — evaluation point 3"
  ]
}
